docs.summary: Describes the SEO Keyword Suggestions SPI.

params.name: keyword
params.doc: Keyword to analyze for SEO strength and request for suggestions of similar keywords.

extra.description: Retrieves keyword suggestions for given phrase

members.name: keyword
members.doc: Keyword to analyze for SEO strength and request for suggestions of similar keywords.

members.name: keyword
members.doc: `Required`. Keyword suggestions offered by the SEO tool.

members.name: volume
members.doc: `Required`. The average number of searches per month for the keyword.

members.name: difficulty
members.doc: `Required`. An indication of how competitive the keyword is and how difficult to rank in an organic search. A higher difficulty means the keyword has a lower search ranking.

members.name: latestTrends
members.doc: `Required`. The number of searches for the keyword per month over the last 12 months.

members.name: searcherIntent
members.doc: User's reason for searching for the keyword (optional).

members.name: quota
members.doc: Information about remaining credit in the paid plan.

members.name: remaining
members.doc: Number of searches left until end of current quota cycle.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Total number of searches available in quota cycle.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Start time of current quota cycle.

members.name: endDate
members.doc: End time for current quota cycle. After this date, the quota is reset.

members.name: paidPlan
members.doc:
Whether user currently has a paid plan.
 If false, user is offered an upgrade using the upgrade_url.

members.name: quota
members.doc: Updated quota after request successfully proccessed

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • COMMERCIAL - user search about specific brands or services, usually with an intent to purchase.
  • INFORMATIONAL - user search for information on some topic.
  • NAVIGATIONAL - user search for a specific page, site, or physical location.
  • TRANSACTIONAL - user search to perform some transaction for example a purchase.
